# pitchR  <img src= "https://github.com/Reed-Math241/pkgGrpq/blob/master/figs/IMG_0175.png" align="right" width=175 />

The goal of pitchR is to create a accessible dataset with advanced pitcher analytics and salaries.  When we did a project last semester we noticed that there wasn't a similar dataset.
